spiritsExplanation:
The workout video is primarily categorized under 'High-Energy & Intense' due to its emphasis on full body fat loss and cardio, as seen in the title '30 min Full Body Fat Loss Standing Workout' and tags like 'cardio workout', 'fat burn', 'full body workout', and 'no jumping workout'.
